file_content.text: They said we'd be safe here, but no one's been in touch....
You're not one of the guards. What's going on here? No one's telling us anything!
We've got to get our stuff ready to go. Thanks for everything.
Calm down. We need everyone to gather their things. We're moving you all offworld.
Offworld? My husband's out there! Please! You've got to tell us what's happening!
Things aren't good. The prisoners have taken over, and we can't let them find you.
I--okay. Thank you. That's not what I wanted to hear, but I can deal with it.
It's what we always fear. We'll get our things--and we'll wait... and hope.
Right now, you need to get on the transport.
He'll tell you once it's safe.
You can't keep us in the dark like this! What about my husband?
Your husband's doing his job right now. Help me do mine and get everyone ready to go.
Thanks. I promise, I'll tell them what's going on once we're under way.
The prisoners are killing everyone they find.
What? My husband! I have to find him! We can't leave without him!
Thanks a lot. That'll make my job easier. You should go. Now.
